args:
Determine whether this NHTSA investigation summary is relevant to the Washington Post. Return `{"result": true}` or `{"result": false}`
content: Cracked Fuel Injector May Leak and Cause a Fire

Ford Motor Company (Ford) is recalling certain 2020-2022 Escape and 2021-2023 Bronco Sport vehicles previously repaired incorrectly under recall numbers 22V-859 or 24V-187.  A fuel injector may crack and leak fuel inside the engine compartment.A fuel leak in the presence of an ignition source such as hot engine or exhaust components, can increase the risk of a fire.

Number of Units Affected: 33576.0
